name: Sweet B-Day
description:
Tell someone happy birthday in the sweetest way!  This gift is sure to bring a smile to the special person!

Gift Contents:

Let's Celebrate - Birthday Cake
Assorted Candy Bonbons
Cherry Sours
Gingerbread Cookies
Milk Chocolate Cripies
Chocolate Chip Pecan Cookies
Martinelli's Apple Cider

name: Cup of Holiday
description: Sip into the holidays with this adorable cup and saucer decked out in red, white and green.  The set holds gourmet hot chocolate and chocolate chip pecan cookies.

name: Holiday Tempo
description:
Keep the beat of the holidays with this delicious assortment of gourmet treats.  

Gift Includes: 

Truffles
Cherry Sours
Mix Fruit Candies
Chocolate Toffee Almonds
Chocolate Caramel Toffee Pretzel Rods
Peanut Brittle
Sugar Cookies 
Hot Cocoa
Peppermints

name: Quiet Time
description:
This small gift packs a lot of exquisite punch!  Created for the person who enjoys nice things.  Everything you will need to enjoy a day of relaxation - all nestled in a beautiful, Biltmore Estate inspired metal vase.  

This gift includes:

Cocoa Mango Body Truffles - Body Souffle
Cocoa Mango Lip Butter
Cocoa Mango Foaming Bath 
Hemingway Tea
Honey Sticks
English Toffee Caramels
Tranquility Relaxation CD
Wooden Body Scubber
Bath Pillow

name: Delicious Luxury
description:
This is a great gift to add to your list for the upcoming holiday season.  

This gift includes: 

Chocolate Truffles
Australian Glazed Apricots
Mixed Nuts
Pretzels
Espresso Shortbread
Asiago Cheese Shortbread
Trail Mix
Dried Pears and Apricots

name: Early Bird
description:
This gift basket is sure to make the fisher in your family happy!  Filled with delicious treats for that early morning fishing trip.

Gift Includes: 

Chocolate-Covered Espresso Beans
Dipping Pretzels
Sweet & Tangy Dipping Mustard
Java Cinnamon Sweet Sticks
Beef Summer Sausage
Ginger Beer

name: Nuts About Golf
description:
This gift is "par"fect for the person who loves to stay on the green!

Gift Includes: 

White chocolate ganache champagne centered golf ball-shapped truffles, Southwest snack mix, Brazilian jumbo cashews, jumbo almonds.

name: Baseball Truffles
description: Hit a homerun with these delicious truffles.  Four milk chocolate peanut butter ganache, enrobed in ivory chocolate and hand decorated with red stitching.

name: Brief Expressions
description:
This unique briefcase container is a great way to deliver an abundance of gourmet treats!  
 
Contents: 

Milk Chocolate Cappuccino Bar
Chocolate-Covered Almonds
Chocolate -Covered Cherries
Jumbo Cashews
Jumbo Pistachios
Milk Chocolate Cherry Bar
Milk Chocolate Bar
Fruite Ganache Truffles
Cabernet Chocolate & Chocolate Chips Cookies
Orange Biscotti

name: Sweet & Savory
description:
Sweet, savory?  Why not have both!

Contents: 

Smoked Almonds
Philo Dough and Aged Asiago Cheese Crackers
California Pistachios
Asian Spiced Pecans

name: Stacked Treasures
description:
This distinguished set of faux leather trunks are filled with an array of sweet treats.  

Contents: 

European Truffles
Dried Fruit
Pistachios
Spiced Pecans
Asiago Cheese Shortbread Cookies
Cabernet Chocolate Biscotti
Cabernet Nut Biscotti

name: Class of 2012 Glass Picture Frame
description: Show off your favorite pic in this keepsake frame.  This 1" thick durable glass frame holds a 4x6 photo.

name: Soap and Lotion Caddy
description: A sinkside holder for your soap and lotion. Sturdy plated chrome lasts forever and neatly and conveniently organizes your hand care. Stylish black finish matches all decor.

name: Redwood Bonsai Set
description:
This beautifully packaged Dawn Redwood Bonsai (related to the coastal redwoods of California) set includes a recycled US steel box, tree and moss seeds, soil, seedling pots, seed starter wafers, bonsai scissors and rake with spade, river stone and growing instructions.

Box measures: 3.25" high x 9.5" square

name: Mini Pail Gardens
description: These packaged container gardens include a leak-proof US made galvanized pail, coconut husks for drainage and all the ingredients to grow exceptional flowers, herbs and tomatoes.  A perfect complement to any windowsill or patio garden.  Choose from: Tomato, Herb, Lavender, and Mixed Zinnias - or choose them all!

name: Moonstruck Chocolate Caramel Collection
description:
This is THE collection for caramel connoisseurs -- three rich caramels, each with their own unique flavor profiles. We slow cook all of our caramels in small batches in open copper kettles, achieving just the right temperature to ensure the ultimate in caramel decadence. Six pieces: 

Espresso Caramel - Chewy caramel flavored with espresso, enrobed in dark chocolate and delicately topped with roasted cocoa nibs. 

Sea Salt Cajeta Caramel - A unique soft goat's milk caramel flavored with imported premium Maldon pure flaky sea salt crystals, inside a dark chocolate scallop shell. 

Sea Salt Vanilla Caramel - Chewy caramel flavored with premium Maldon pure flaky sea salt crystals and pure Madagascar vanilla, enrobed in milk chocolate and delicately topped with sea salt flakes.

name: Dark Chocolate Hazelnut Bark
description: Dark Chocolate is mixed with crunchy, freshly roasted hazelnuts in this delectable bark hand-decorated with a festive pink and red heart design.

name: Show Me Delicious - Deluxe
description:
This gift basket is great to welcome out of town guests.  Also great to give away for meetings, conferences and wedding guests.  We can also add tourist guides and maps. All the products are made in Missouri and packaged within a Missouri-shaped gift container.

This gift contains:

* 16 inch - Missouri-Shaped Basket
* Oatmeal Cookies
* St. Louis Chocolate Bar
* Triple Mix Popcorn 
* Cherry Bites
* Buttermels Caramels
* Potato Chips
* Caramel Glazed Pecans
* Fitz's Rootbeer & Orange Sodas
* St. Louis Historic Book
* Chocolate Pecan Pretzel Stick

name: Lavender & Sweets
description:
This beautiful trunk is the perfect gift for that someone who wants to escape.  With the relaxing and calming scent of Lavender - it's easy to do. 

This gift contains:

* French Berry Lemonade
* French Truffles
* Lavender Bubble Bath
* Lavender Bath Salts
* Lavender Scented Candle Tin
* Chocolate-Covered Pretzel Bites
* Tranquility Spa Music CD
* Journal 
* Key Lime Hard Candy

name: Lunch Hour
description:
Gift includes:

* Insulated Lunch Tote
* Single Cup - Coffee
* Chocolate-Covered Espresso Beans
* Chocolate-Covered Cappuccino Sticks
* Writing Pad with Pen
* Biscotti
* Silver-Plated Frame

name: Three Valises
description:
These three miniature valises (suitcases) are "packed" with delicious goodies!

Gift includes:

* Praline Pecan Shortbread
* Cream Cheese Pound Cakes
* French Truffles

name: Little Birthday Wagon
description:
The birthday girl or boy will be very excited to receive this gift!

Gift includes:

* Stuff Animal
* Happy Birthday Cake Mix
* Marshmellow French Fries
* Bubble Bath Sand 
* Hand Soap
* Mini Wagon

name: Man's Best Friend
description:
Your little pooch will love to receive this gift!  

Gift includes:

* Doggie Biscuits
* Tire Chew Toy
* Beef Flavored Rawhide
* Extra Large Bone-shaped Cookie

name: Welcome Wagon
description:
A great way to welcome new home owners!  This gift is sure to make a BIG statement! 

Gift includes:

* Alcohol-Free Wine
* Toffee-Caramel Balls
* Sugar Cookies
* Fruit Salad Candies
* French Truffles 
* Caramel Pecan Cookies
* Olives
* Wine Wafers
* Rum Cake
* Cherry Sours

name: Healthy Start
description:
Create a healthy start to your home with these natural household products. Your home and laundry will smell fresh with the clean scent of Lemon Verbena!

Gift Includes: 

* Laundry Powder
* Liquid Fabric Softener
* Laundry Sachets
* Linen Spray
* Shea Butter Lotion
* Liquid Soap
* Liquid Dish Soap
* Soy Candle
* Furniture Wax

description:
Gorgeous faux leather boxes filled with delicious chocolates - a great corporate gift!

This gift includes: 
* French Truffles
* Triple Chocolate Chip Cookies
* Chocolate Crispy Wedge
* Chocolate-Covered Pretzels

name: Sweet Baggage
description: Delicious snack items all packed and ready to go!  The Live, Love & Laugh valise is also a great item to have after all the treats are gone!

name: Executive Appreciation
description:
Saying thank you just became a little tastier! 

This gift includes:

* Crackers
* Salame
* Dijon Mustard
* Smoked Gouda Cheese
* Green Olives with Herbs
* Pear Juice

name: Cafe Continental
description:
A great gift for the coffee lovers!

This gift includes:

* Shortbread Cookies
* White Chocolate-Covered Espresso Beans
* Chocolate & Caramel Dipping Spoon
* Chocolate Wafer Cookie
* Hazelnut Flavored Syrup
* Columbian Coffee
* Chocolate Crispy Wedge
* Coffee Press

name: Breakfast In Bed
description:
Get the day started right with everything you need for a great breakfast - including serving tray! 

This gift includes:

* Scone Mix
* Drinking Chocolate
* Scottish Strawberry Preserves 
* Banana Pancake Mix
* French Berry Lemonade
* Maple Syrup

name: Eggs-tradinary Wagon Layette
description:
This whimsical chick wagon pulls a peck of seven needed baby essentials right to the mom-to-be! This is a perfect gift for either boy or girl.  The gift includes:

Hooded blanket
Bodysuit
Bib
Hat 
Booties
Plush chick rattle

Size: 0-6 months

Wagon measures: 14"H x 9"W x 11"D

name: Welcome Baby Wagon
description:
The big day has come and what better way to welcome a little bundle of joy than with a welcome wagon! This functional wagon comes comes in blue or pink with:

Hooded terry cloth towel
Receiving blanket
Sleeping gown
Long-sleeved body suit
Short-sleeved body suit
Bib
Burp cloth
Terry velour wash cloth
Booties

Size: 0-6 months

name: Going "Green" Baby Layette
description:
This adorable, 100% organic cotton, five piece layette comes with a blanket, footed pajamas, cap, bib and pea-pod rattle. 

Size: 0-6 months
Machine washable

name: Little Tee Time Layette
description:
This golf-themed layette is a stroke of genius! The layette includes a green and beige argyle design body suit with snap closure, matching argyle tam and white booties. 
The layette also comes with an adorable mini golf cart box that is used to package the gift! 

Machine washable, 100% cotton.
Ages 0-6 months

name: Rocking Horse with Layette
description:
This beautiful steed is made of natural-wood, rich in chocolate velour accents on the mane, ears and tail. Outfitted with an eight-piece layette with embroidered rocking horse for your choice of a pink or blue.  And the pony can also be a beautiful decor to any child's room. 

Layette Includes: 

Receiving Blanket
Bodysuit
Bib
Booties
Plush Rocking Horse Rattle

Layette is machine-washable. 100% cotton

Measurements: 24" L x 18.5" H x 10" W

name: Fashionable Suitcase
description:
Travel in expressive style with these fun over-sized suitcases.  These suitcases roll too! 
Choose from Zebra or polka dot pattern.

Dimensions:12"H X 20"W X 11"D

name: Eieio-Giant Horse Bank
description:
Adorable hand-painted ceramic bank.  Coin slot doubles as the exit hole and comes with stopper. 
Also available in Cow Bank.

name: Little Sprout Tea Set
description: Adorable flowered tea set comes with 1 teapot, tray, 2 cups and saucers in a dainty hatbox.

name: Ballerina Piggy Bank
description: Ceramic bank with handmade roses and cute pink tulle tutu.

name: Class of...Lap Desks
description:
Lap desk with removable pillow bottom - great for writing or reading in the bed or floor. 
Choose from flower or dots design.

name: Bride Pocket Tote
description: This classic black and white tote with four large pockets can hold all the needed items that the bride will need to get ready for her big day.  Also available for Bridesmaid.

name: Baby Time Capsule
description:
Parents fill Baby's Time Capsule with memorabilia from the day and year of their child's birth. This timeless keepsake is then sealed until a designated day--years in the future--when the baby is grown. This heartwarming 22-piece gift set comes with everything needed to create an absolutely unforgettable treasure. 

Dimensions:
12" tall x 6.5" wide.

name: Wedding Time Capsule
description:
Newlyweds fill the Wedding Time Capsule with memorabilia from the day and year of their marriage. This timeless keepsake is then sealed and not opened until a special anniversary years in the future. This heartwarming 21-piece gift set comes with everything needed to create an absolutely unforgettable treasure. 

*For an additional cost, this gift can be beautifully wrapped in tulle and ribbon (click the drop down below to change your option).

Dimensions:
12" tall x 6.5" wide.

name: London Picnic Backpack Cooler for Two
description:
Fully equipped picnic Backpack for two with antique brass hardware. Detachable wine holder & Thermal Shield™ insulated cooler section to keep food and drink at the perfect temperature. Includes combination corkscrew, hardwood cutting board, cheese knife, wooden salt & pepper shakers with non spill tops, acrylic wine glasses, melamine plates, stainless steel flatware, and napkins. Constructed of 600D poly-canvas. 

Contents:
2 Glasses, 8oz acrylic 
2 Forks, knives and spoons,stainless steel 
1 Cutting Board, wood with juice grooves, 5" x 6" 
1 Cheese Knife, stainless steel with wood handle 
1 Set spill proof salt and pepper shakers, wood 
1 Insulated detachable wine/drink pouch 
2 Plates, 9" melamine 
1 Corkscrew, waiter style stainless steel 
2 Napkins, cotton 13" x 13"

name: Huntsman Picnic Basket for Four
description: The Huntsman Picnic Basket has a traditional style. Hand crafted using full reed willow, this generously sized basket is made to last. Easy to pack, carry, and enjoy, it includes quanlity components including ceramic plates and glass wine glasses. Includes: (4) ceramic plates, glass wine glasses, stainless flatware, cotton napkins, (1) food cooler, insulated wine pouch, hardwood cutting board, spill proof salt & pepper shakers, wood handle cheese knife, stainless waiters corkscrew, and 50" x 60" fleece blanket. Natural Willow with leather handle, closures, hinge covers.

name: Truffle Treasures
description:
Treat yourself to a decadent spa experience right in your own home! This gift basket is full of bath and body products that not only look awesome, but smell awesome as well.  This is a chocolate-lover's dream! 

Gift Basket includes: 

Cocoa Mango Lip Butter
Cocoa Mango Bath Sachet
Cocoa Mango Romantic Candle
Sparkling Apple Cider
Gourmet Chocolate Truffles
Note Pad

name: Twenty Reasons
description:
Create an in-home spa for your feet and hands in one gift! This basket is created to give you all you need to take care of your over-worked feet and hands with soothing Peppermint & Avocado. These products are made without using harmful chemicals and dyes - so you can enjoy...naturally! 

Gift Basket Includes:

Peppermint Foot Scrub
Peppermint Foot Cream
Foot File
Avocado Hand Butter
Avocado Exfoliating Hand & Elbow Scrub
2-Way Nail Buffer

name: A Job Well Done
description:
Show an employee that their work is appreciated by giving them a gift especially created for hard working professionals! The container (shaped like a file cabinet - complete with lid), will be a keepsake long after the goodies have been eaten.

Contains:
Poppycock Popcorn, Chocolate Chip Pecan Cookies, Gourmet Nuts, Peppermint Sticks, and Chocolate-Covered Caramel Pretzels.

name: You're the Bees Knees
description: A gift that will soothe and delight! This collection of sweet treats, teas, and a honey-patterned tea pot is presented in a pretty wicker basket with flowering branches.

name: Welcome Home
description:
This basket is the perfect thing to share with a family or friend who's just moved into their new home, condo, or apartment. Filled with delicious treats that can be enjoyed by the whole family.

Contains: Dipping Pretzels, Dill Mustard, Chocolate-Pecan Cookies, Croissant Crackers, Flavored-Infused Maple Syrup, Tomato Basil Cheese, Creamy Vegetable Dip, Magnatic Note Pad.
